customer_name: Goats On The Roof Of The Smokies LLC
site_name: GOATS ON THE ROOF OF THE SMOKIES L L C

citations.narrative:
***The goats do not have adequate shade at the ground level enclosure. Shade is provided if the goats go into the barn
but the goats generally stay outside during public exhibition because the public is allowed to feed. The temperature during
todays inspection is 94 degrees and there is no additional shade structure present to protect the goats from the direct
sunlight. Continual exposure to direct sunlight and heat can cause dehydration, heatstroke and death. Additional shade
shall be provided in the more common areas for the goats to protect them from extended exposure to extreme heat and
sunlight. Correct by August 4, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Manager.
